dashboard.label: Vulnerability Manager Overview
dashboard.definition:
{"dataSources":{"ds_kVRFhXkW":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` severity=*"},"name":"GVM.Vulnerabilities"},"ds_L0jAXm4C":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_kVRFhXkW","query":"| stats count by severity"},"name":"Count.BySeverity"},"ds_HwDMKNoN":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` severity=*
| eval key = dest_ip + 'result.nvt{@oid}' 
| stats dc(key) as Vulnerabilities by severity
| eval severity_level = case(severity=="informational", 0, severity=="low", 1, severity=="medium", 2, severity=="high", 3, 1=1, -1)
| sort -severity_level
| fields - severity_level
`make_proper_case(severity)`
| rename severity as Severity
| addcoltotals Vulnerabilities
| fillnull value=Total Severity"},"name":"Top5.ByCategoryAndSeverity"},"ds_dxMyOozZ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` severity=*
| stats dc(dest)"},"name":"Assets.Count"},"ds_WhIfMnrr":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` severity=*
| stats dc(dest) by severity"},"name":"Assets.BySeverity"},"ds_V2k6IfRQ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype`
| stats latest(_time) as Modified max(cvss) as cvss by result.host.hostname, dest_ip
| where cvss > 0
| convert ctime(Modified)
| rename cvss as "Severity (CVSS)", result.host.hostname as Hostname, dest_ip as "IP Address"
| table Hostname, "IP Address", "Severity (CVSS)", Modified
| sort -"Severity (CVSS)""},"name":"Assets.BySeverity.Details"},"ds_w2w4J9M5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` "result.nvt{@oid}"=TERM(`os_detection_nvt_oid`)
| rex field=result.description "OS:\s+OS:\s+(?<operating_system>.*?)\s(CPE:|Version:)"
| stats dc(dest) by operating_system"},"name":"Assets.ByOperatingSystem"},"ds_5d0Zw8Uq":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` "result.nvt{@oid}"=TERM(`os_detection_nvt_oid`)
| rex field=result.description "OS:\s+OS:\s+(?<operating_system>.*?)\s(CPE:|Version:)"
| stats dc(operating_system) as count"},"name":"Assets.OperatingSystems.Count"},"ds_3D8TI94o_ds_5d0Zw8Uq":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` "result.nvt{@oid}"=TERM(`service_detection_nvt_oid`)
| eval key = 'result.host' . location
| stats dc(key) as ExposedServices"},"name":"Assets.Services.Count"},"ds_TCphXAKW":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` result.nvt.family=*
`make_proper_case(severity)`
| timechart count by severity"},"name":"Results.BySeverity.Timeline"},"ds_xcUXiYIg":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype`
| eval key = dest_ip + 'result.nvt{@oid}'
| fillnull value="Other" category
| chart dc(key) over severity by category
| eval severity_level = case(severity=="informational", 0, severity=="low", 1, severity=="medium", 2, severity=="high", 3, 1=1, -1)
| sort -severity_level 
| fields - severity_level
`make_proper_case(severity)`"},"name":"Results.OverSeverity.ByCategory"},"ds_t9X3ijHG":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` signature="SSL/TLS:*"
| rex field="result.description" "[\s,:]+(?<certificate>CN=.*?)\s+(Signature|key-size|subject|\(Server certificate\)|Certificate)"
| rex field="result.description" "(\(serial:issuer\):|\|)\s+(?<serial>\w+)(:|\ssubject)"
| rex field="result.description" "valid until\s+\|\s+(?<valid_until>[\d\-:\s]+)\sUTC"
| eval key = certificate + serial
| stats latest(valid_until) as valid_until dc(key) as cert_count by certificate
| eval status = if(now() > strptime(valid_until, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "Expired", "Valid")
| stats sum(cert_count) as count by status"},"name":"Certificates.ByStatus"},"ds_0sVrKoPe":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` signature="SSL/TLS:*"
| rex field="result.description" "[\s,:]+(?<certificate>CN=.*?)\s+(Signature|key-size|subject|\(Server certificate\)|Certificate)"
| rex field="result.description" "(\(serial:issuer\):|\|)\s+(?<serial>\w+)(:|\ssubject)"
| eval key = certificate + serial
| stats dc(key) as count"},"name":"Certificates.Count"},"ds_199wgIJX":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` severity!=informational
| eval key = dest_ip + 'result.nvt{@oid}' 
| stats dc(key) as count"},"name":"Vulnerabilities.Count"},"ds_DMCVG5Vw":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` cve=* severity=high
| stats dc(result.name) as vulnerabilities dc(cve) as cves avg(cvss) as avg_score values(dest) as hosts by _time
| eval annotation_label = "[" . vulnerabilities . "] High Severity Vulnerabilities Detected (Avg. Score: " . round(avg_score,1) . ") - Distinct CVEs: " . cves
| eval annotation_color = case(avg_score > 7 AND avg_score <8, "#FFD588", avg_score >= 8 AND avg_score < 9, "#DD9F54", avg_score >= 9 AND avg_score <= 10, "#D41F1F")
| stats count by _time, annotation_color, annotation_label"},"name":"Results.HighSeverity.Annotations"},"ds_Ridsjz9F_ds_3D8TI94o_ds_5d0Zw8Uq":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` severity !=informational
| stats dc(location) as VulnerablePorts"},"name":"Assets.Ports.Count"},"ds_SizQaltm_ds_HwDMKNoN":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` severity !=informational
| eval key = dest_ip + 'result.nvt{@oid}' 
| stats dc(key) as Vulnerabilities by result.nvt.solution{@type}
| fillnull value="None Identified" result.nvt.solution{@type}
| rename result.nvt.solution{@type} as "Solution Type""},"name":"Vulnerabilities.BySolution"}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-7d@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","width":1920,"height":1080,"backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"contain","x":0,"y":0,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://625ecae6ad6ff95aa0223081"}},"structure":[{"item":"viz_yYHnmo3d","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":10,"w":1710,"h":55}},{"item":"viz_IkGUoVME","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":23,"w":420,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_qxPQw4nM","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":70,"w":1710,"h":290}},{"item":"viz_MgHBMw1O","type":"block","position":{"x":270,"y":90,"w":280,"h":210}},{"item":"viz_ORk9tQYk","type":"block","position":{"x":-70,"y":70,"w":420,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_G4TP1wEW","type":"block","position":{"x":57,"y":170,"w":170,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_PjaoflWK","type":"block","position":{"x":78,"y":220,"w":120,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_v55IwJ0F","type":"block","position":{"x":560,"y":90,"w":1150,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_qlr4XQGU","type":"block","position":{"x":270,"y":90,"w":280,"h":220}},{"item":"viz_22BA3VwN","type":"block","position":{"x":1570,"y":-6,"w":150,"h":90}},{"item":"viz_ndhxACei","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":370,"w":1710,"h":290}},{"item":"viz_0KvHOjun","type":"block","position":{"x":-70,"y":370,"w":420,"h":310}},{"item":"viz_pWGjZp7k","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":370,"w":420,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_VHfjfnUH","type":"block","position":{"x":56,"y":470,"w":170,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_KmLEhbOl","type":"block","position":{"x":108,"y":520,"w":70,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_5F1DnY9N","type":"block","position":{"x":770,"y":410,"w":940,"h":240}},{"item":"viz_2rLuWwai","type":"block","position":{"x":770,"y":410,"w":940,"h":240}},{"item":"viz_dZIeqF6p","type":"block","position":{"x":175,"y":370,"w":420,"h":310}},{"item":"viz_9s6nt7al","type":"block","position":{"x":300,"y":470,"w":170,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_Nw7QBn86","type":"block","position":{"x":340,"y":520,"w":90,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_5nQqvuy8","type":"block","position":{"x":347,"y":540,"w":95,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_ccV42MZs","type":"bloc
